DataMethod.Name: dm_DefaultCreditClassPGCC
DataMethod.Description: Determine Default Credit Class for CCC.
DataMethod.ExpressionText: for every Application.CreditApplication.BusinessApplicant.BusinessApplicantOutput relative to CreditApplication do if(BusinessApplicantOutput.FINAL_CREDIT_CLASS=null OR Trim(BusinessApplicantOutput.FINAL_CREDIT_CLASS)="")then xAvailableCCTrigger:="5"; endif endfor //set default only when final credit class is blank if(xAvailableCCTrigger = "5") then for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant relative to CreditApplication do if(PersonalApplicant.OFACFlag<>null and PersonalApplicant.OFACFlag<>"" and PersonalApplicant.OFACFlag="Y")then xAvailableCCTrigger:="OFAC"; else if(PersonalApplicant.FlagHotName<>null and PersonalApplicant.FlagHotName<>"" and PersonalApplicant.FlagHotName="Y")then xAvailableCCTrigger:="HotName"; endif endif endfor for every Application.CreditApplication.BusinessApplicant.BusinessApplicantOutput relative to CreditApplication do if(BusinessApplicantOutput.RESULT_NEG_CREDIT_CLASS <>null and BusinessApplicantOutput.RESULT_NEG_CREDIT_CLASS<>"" )then xAvailableCCTrigger:="NegFile"; endif endfor endif for every Application.CreditApplication.BusinessApplicant.BusinessApplicantOutput relative to CreditApplication do if(xAvailableCCTrigger<>null or xAvailableCCTrigger<>"")then if(xAvailableCCTrigger="OFAC" or xAvailableCCTrigger="HotName")then CreditApplication.REVIEW_CREDIT_CLASS:="S"; else if(xAvailableCCTrigger="NegFile")then BusinessApplicantOutput.FINAL_CREDIT_CLASS:="6"; else if(xAvailableCCTrigger="5")then BusinessApplicantOutput.FINAL_CREDIT_CLASS:="5"; endif endif endif endif endfor

DataMethod.Description: Converts all PR strategy CC from L to D
DataMethod.ExpressionText:

endif endif endif endif endfor

DataMethod.Description: Sets the Credit Class to Whitelist Credit Class
DataMethod.ExpressionText:
for every Application.CreditApplication.WHITE_LIST relative to Application do if (WHITE_LIST.CREDIT_CLASS<>null and WHITE_LIST.CREDIT_CLASS<>"") then xCreditClass:=WHITE_LIST.CREDIT_CLASS; endif endfor
if(xCreditClass<>"") then for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.PersonalApplicantOutput relative to Application do PersonalApplicantOutput.INITIAL_CREDIT_CLASS := xCreditClass; PersonalApplicantOutput.FINAL_CREDIT_CLASS := xCreditClass; endfor endif

DataMethod.Name: dm_SelectScoreModel
DataMethod.Description: Selects the proper Score Model for Decision
DataMethod.ExpressionText:
result:="0"; if(CreditApplication.type<>null and CreditApplication.type<>"")then xApplicationType:=CreditApplication.Type; endif
for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.PersonalApplicantOutput relative to CreditApplication do if(InStringList(PersonalApplicantOutput.FINAL_CREDIT_CLASS,"C,D,H,I,L,Y,S",",") and xApplicationType="Consumer" or (CreditApplication.REVIEW_CREDIT_CLASS <> null and CreditApplication.REVIEW_CREDIT_CLASS = "S")) then CreditApplication.TEMPLATE_CODE:="CCC001"; endif endfor For every Application.CreditApplication.BusinessApplicant.BusinessApplicantOutput relative to CreditApplication do if(InStringList(BusinessApplicantOutput.FINAL_CREDIT_CLASS,"0,5,6,7",",") and xApplicationType="Business" or (CreditApplication.REVIEW_CREDIT_CLASS <> null AND CreditApplication.REVIEW_CREDIT_CLASS = "S")) then CreditApplication.TEMPLATE_CODE:="BCC001"; endif endfor
If(PuertoRicoStrategy=null or PuertoRicoStrategy="CHALLENGER_1") then for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.SCORES relative to CreditApplication do If(SCORES.PCR6>0) then for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.SCORES.SCORE_MODEL in dor_PCRv6ScoreModel do SCORE_MODEL.IS_SCORE_MODEL_DECISION:=true; endfor else If(SCORES.PCR4>0) then for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.SCORES.SCORE_MODEL in dor_PCRv4ScoreModel do SCORE_MODEL.IS_SCORE_MODEL_DECISION:=true; endfor else If(SCORES.LNScore<>null) then for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.SCORES.SCORE_MODEL in dor_LNScoreModel do SCORE_MODEL.IS_SCORE_MODEL_DECISION:=true; endfor else for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.SCORES.SCORE_MODEL in dor_PCRv4ScoreModel do SCORE_MODEL.IS_SCORE_MODEL_DECISION:=true; endfor endif endif endif endfor else if (PuertoRicoStrategy="CHAMPION_1")then for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.SCORES.SCORE_MODEL in dor_NA3ScoreModel do SCORE_MODEL.IS_SCORE_MODEL_DECISION:=true; endfor for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.SCORES.SCORE_MODEL in dor_AEScoreModel do SCORE_MODEL.IS_SCORE_MODEL_DECISION:=true; endfor endif endif

DataMethod.Name: dm_DeterminePhoneTier
DataMethod.Description: Determine the Phone tier of an Applicant
DataMethod.ExpressionText:
result := "";
for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.ExternalDataSource.consumer.NeustarDataSource.Response.Output.batchQueryResponse.NeustarElement.NeustarResults relative to PersonalApplicant do if(NeustarResults.PhoneTier <> null and Trim(NeustarResults.PhoneTier) = "A")then xPhoneTier := NeustarResults.PhoneTier; endif endfor
for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.PersonalApplicantOutput relative to PersonalApplicant do if(xPhoneTier <> null and xPhoneTier = "A") then PersonalApplicantOutput.phoneTier := xPhoneTier ; endif endfor
if(xPhoneTier <> null and TRIM(xPhoneTier) <> "") then result := xPhoneTier; endif

dm_DeterminePGEigibility
DataMethod.Description: Determine PG CC intermediate Fact Types.
DataMethod.ExpressionText:
result:=null; xScore:="N";
xBureauName := ""; for every Application.CreditApplication.BusinessApplicant.BusinessApplicantOutput relative to BusinessApplicant do if(BusinessApplicantOutput.businessBureauName <> null and BusinessApplicantOutput.businessBureauName <> "") then xBureauName := BusinessApplicantOutput.businessBureauName; endif endfor
if(xBureauName="EFX")then for every Application.CreditApplication.BusinessApplicant.BusinessApplicantOutput relative to BusinessApplicant do if(BusinessApplicantOutput.BusRiskScore <> null and BusinessApplicantOutput.BusRiskScore>=517)then xScore:="Y"; endif endfor endif
if(xBureauName="XPB")then for every Application.CreditApplication.BusinessApplicant.BusinessApplicantOutput relative to BusinessApplicant do if(BusinessApplicantOutput.BusRiskScore <> null and BusinessApplicantOutput.BusRiskScore>=9520)then xScore:="Y"; endif endfor endif
for every Application.CreditApplication.BusinessApplicant.BusinessApplicantOutput relative to BusinessApplicant do BusinessApplicantOutput.RiskScoreAboveThreshold:=xScore; endfor

DataMethod.Name: dm_set_CreditClass4
dm_AssignBureauScoreAndName
DataMethod.ExpressionText:
xBureauScore:=-999;
for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.ExternalDataSource.consumer.DataSource.Response.Output.ParsedResponseList.ParsedResponse.HeaderList.Header relative to PersonalApplicant do
if(Header.Bureau<>null and Header.Bureau="TU4.1") then xBureauName:="TU"; endif
if(Header.Bureau<>null and Header.Bureau="EFU") then xBureauName:="EFX"; endif endfor
if(xBureauName<>"" and xBureauName="EFX")then for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.ExternalDataSource.consumer.DataSource.Response.Output.ParsedResponseList.ParsedResponse relative to PersonalApplicant do for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.ExternalDataSource.consumer.DataSource.Response.Output.ParsedResponseList.ParsedResponse.ScoringList.Scoring relative to ParsedResponse do if(Scoring.Score<>null and Scoring.Score<>"") then xBureauScore:=Val(Scoring.Score); endif endfor endfor else if(xBureauName<>"" and xBureauName="TU")then for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.ExternalDataSource.consumer.DataSource.Response.Output.ParsedResponseList.ParsedResponse relative to PersonalApplicant do for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.ExternalDataSource.consumer.DataSource.Response.Output.ParsedResponseList.ParsedResponse.ScoringList.Scoring relative to ParsedResponse do if(Scoring.ModelTypeIndicator <> null and Scoring.ModelTypeIndicator <> "" and Scoring.ModelTypeIndicator = "00Q87")then if(Scoring.Score <> null and Scoring.Score <> "") then xBureauPRScore := Val(Scoring.Score); endif endif if(Scoring.ModelTypeIndicator <> null and Scoring.ModelTypeIndicator <> "")then if(Scoring.Score <> null and Scoring.Score <> "") then xBureauScore := Val(Scoring.Score); endif endif endfor
if(xBureauPRScore <> -999) then xBureauScore := xBureauPRScore; endif endfor endif endif
for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.SCORES relative to PersonalApplicant do SCORES.BureauScore:=xBureauScore; SCORES.BureauName:=xBureauName; endfor

DataMethod.Name: dm_SetFinalCreditClass_CCC
DataMethod.Description: assign final credit class to personal applicant output
DataMethod.ExpressionText:
for every Application.CreditApplication.PersonalApplicant.PersonalApplicantOutput relative to PersonalApplicant do if((PersonalApplicantOutput.RESULT_NEG_CREDIT_CLASS=null or PersonalApplicantOutput.RESULT_NEG_CREDIT_CLASS="") and (PersonalApplicantOutput.IRC_CREDIT_CLASS=null or PersonalApplicantOutput.IRC_CREDIT_CLASS ="" ))then
PersonalApplicantOutput.FINAL_CREDIT_CLASS:=PersonalApplicantOutput.INITIAL_CREDIT_CLASS; else if(PersonalApplicantOutput.RESULT_NEG_CREDIT_CLASS<>null and PersonalApplicantOutput.RESULT_NEG_CREDIT_CLASS<>"")then PersonalApplicantOutput.FINAL_CREDIT_CLASS:=PersonalApplicantOutput.RESULT_NEG_CREDIT_CLASS; else if(PersonalApplicantOutput.IRC_CREDIT_CLASS<>null and PersonalApplicantOutput.IRC_CREDIT_CLASS<>"")then PersonalApplicantOutput.FINAL_CREDIT_CLASS:=PersonalApplicantOutput.IRC_CREDIT_CLASS; endif endif endif
endfor
